subtitleNullable: Dataset for fake news detection in spanish
descriptionNullable:
**Context**

This dataset was created for a TFG (thesis) at the University of Vigo. Its goal was the training of a Transformer model for the detection of fake news in the political domain in Spanish.


**Content**

It contains true news obtained through web scraping from newspaper websites such as 'Público,' 'La Marea,' and 'El Común.' Additionally, it includes fake news created by altering data from the true ones, as well as fake news generated by AI. The news articles date from April 2017 to June 2023.

**Format**

ID;Label;Titulo;Descripcion;Fecha
- ID: represents a unique identifier for each news item in the dataset.
- Label: is a label indicating whether the news item is true or false. It takes the value 1
if the news is true and 0 if it is false. This tag is essential to classify the news in the dataset.
the news in the dataset.
- Titulo: contains the headline of the news item. The title is usually a brief description
that summarizes the main content of the news item.
- Descripcion: provides a more detailed description of the news item. Additional details about the
additional details about the topic or events mentioned in the news item are included here.
- Fecha: contains the date the news item was published. The date follows the format
day/month/year (e.g. "19/04/2023 "for April 19, 2023)

Important, note that the delimiter between the fields is ;

More infomation about model and configuration in Code/Notebook.
